name: Hisser's Hell
description:
A cerberus's PTO request was turned down, so they go on a lowkey rampage across cat hell to reach their vacation boat.

Important note:
Please refresh the page once when you run the game for the first time. Some room elements don't load on the first playthrough, so refreshing once should fix it.

how to play:
arrow keys - move
z - tackle

credits:
sheb - programmer, artist
Wolgwang - level design, audio
